summary: A Skyrim-esque interpretation of Mjolnir, Thor\'s hammer
descriptionHtml:
I based this design of several existing Mjolnir designs but made it fit more with the art style of Skyrim. If Shor was in the game...maybe he would have a weapon such as this.

This is my first mod. At the moment you can access the weapon via the console. Pressing the tilde key ( ` ) and then typing: \"help mjolnir\" to find its ID. Then typing \"player.additem <insert ID here> 1\", or by crafting it. You will need 3 leather strips, 3 Ebony Ingots and 1 Corundum Ore. To improve the weapon you will need 1 Moonstone Ingot.

I hope to soon put the weapon in a chest somewhere in the world. Feel free to use this in your own mods but please credit me. If anyone knows how to make this throwable an returnable - be my guest and use it (and let me know how you did it lol)

Update:

Balanced weapon stats. It now does 10 shock damage, not 33 like in the image and is closer to a glass mace in terms of its physical damage.

Update 2 -  Added a larger version as requested. The hammer head is bigger and the handle is longer. 

Also check out imperistan\'s version of the mod. It uses my model but has a different texture. It can be found at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7040
author: celark

files.name: Mjolnir - Hammer of Shor - Large Version
